name: Epsilon AD
description:
Arcade Control Entry. Made in 72h
Swarm of lasers, be aware of the reflective materials of the enemies !

>>> And there is a small bug for the player not being hurt by it's own weapon, which is the point of the gameplay for this game...  Also the shield stays too long.
>>> Scoreboard is hidden under the picture, hopefully we will update soon.

Sorry because of stress of the deadlines we didn't see these two bugs.

https://chromaphase.itch.io/epsilon-ad-wip pass: pewpew if you want to give a try to the version with the hurting laser and see your own score ;)

Do I need to stat the obvious? Use headphones or sound system ! =]

Controls :
Joystick + button A for fire
Arrow + space for fire
